1218620.name: Church of Shadows
1218620.description:
In a forgotten church, sealed away for centuries, a dark presence waits to be freed. You are the only one who can stop it—an unlikely hero chosen by a preacher on his last legs. Your task is deceptively simple: burn the books and break the curse. But the task is anything but easy.

Features:

  • Survive a Maze of Fear: Explore a dark, abandoned church where every shadow holds danger. The environment twists and shifts as the witch manipulates reality, keeping you on edge.

  • Face Five Unique Demons: Each demon is bound to a cursed book and has its own behavior and hunting style. From the crawling horror of Dal’Gan to the towering brute Verinnath, you’ll need strategy and courage to evade them.

  • Confront the Witch: Once the demons are defeated, Emelyn herself will appear. She can block doorways, twist hallways, and manipulate your surroundings, making her the ultimate challenge.

  • Dynamic Fire Mechanics: To burn the cursed books, you must light a cauldron. Choose wisely: using a regular flame may result in failure, but combining lanterns around the church creates a blue, everlasting fire that guarantees success.

  • Sanity Management: Demons and the witch can break your mind. Protect yourself using crosses to temporarily banish threats, but be careful—resources are limited, and the church itself drains your sanity.

  • High Replayability: Randomized book and demon spawn locations, along with shifting hallways, ensure that no two playthroughs are the same.

  • Terrifying Atmosphere: With dynamic lighting, sound design, and jump scares, the church becomes a living nightmare that pulls you deeper into its horrors.

  • Story to Unravel: Learn the tragic tale of Emelyn Hawke, a healer betrayed by her village and transformed into something monstrous after making a dark pact. Clues scattered around the church reveal the truth behind her vengeance.

Will you break the curse and escape? Or will the witch claim yet another soul?
